Room.Name: Nagaritha Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Nagaritha Drive, south of the Melbourne Arena.
Room.LongDescription: The Melbourne Entertainment Arena provides citizens with the much needed emotional releases of revenge against criminals and other dregs of society. These people, accused and convicted of crimes, are thrown into the pits to do battle with gladiators, and sometimes lions. The spectators also get to join in by throwing rocks and other garbage at the contestants. On the south side of the road is D'Tan's Armory, where some light armor may be purchased before entering the arena.
